// getCustomerByCustno ì˜ resultëŠ” 1ì„ ë¦¬í„´ this.mvc.perform(post("/customer") .contentType(MediaType.APPLICATION_FORM_URLENCODED) .content(EntityUtils.toString(new UrlEncodedFormEntity(Arrays.asList( new BasicNameValuePair("custno", "1"), new BasicNameValuePair("custname", "sehajyang") ))))) .andExpect(status().isOk()) .andExpect(content().string("SUCCESS")) .andReturn() .getResponse();
